intro: Voigtia australis, commonly known as the Australian voigtia, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in dry, sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments. Its leaves are usually narrow and linear, and it produces small, yellowish to white flowers. Voigtia australis is often found in coastal and inland regions of southern Australia.
